edu.harvard.pass.orbiter.gui

Class PASSDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.harvard.util.gui.DefaultGraphDecorator<PNode,PEdge,PSummaryNode,PGraph>
      • edu.harvard.pass.orbiter.gui.PASSDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphDecorator<PNode,PEdge,PSummaryNode,PGraph>

    public class PASSDecorator
extends DefaultGraphDecorator<PNode,PEdge,PSummaryNode,PGraph>
    The graph decorator specific to PASS provenance graphs
    Author:
    Peter Macko
